class tests.opp_ini.Topology[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a generic topology It has attributes and methods common to every topology It is the base class of other more specific classes Current derived classes that have been implemented:

  • RLFT

  • Torus

    • Torus2D

tests.opp_ini.add_new_configuration(simulation, topology, switch, applicacion)[source]¶

It adds a new configuration in the omnetpp.ini file

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder where the omnetpp.ini file is located

tests.opp_ini.check_configuration(simulation, config_name='[Config')[source]¶

It checks if there is a configuration defined in the omnetpp.ini file

Parameters:

  • simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

  • config_name – the name of the configuration to be checked. The default value checks if there is any configuration

Returns:

True if the configuration was found. Prints “Not Found” otherwise

tests.opp_ini.get_configurations(simulation)[source]¶

It retrieves all the configurations within the omnetpp.ini file

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

A list of the configurations located in the omnetpp.ini file. Prints “Nothing Found” if no configurations where found

tests.opp_ini.get_switch_arbiter(simulation)[source]¶

It retrieves the current switch arbiter in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch arbiter being used

tests.opp_ini.get_switch_architecture(simulation)[source]¶

It retrieves the current switch architecture in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch architecture being used

It retrieves the current switch request processing time in use

Parameters:

simulation – the simulation folder to be checked

Returns:

a string with the current switch request processing time

a string with the current switch routing algorithm being used
